title: Task Claim Response
description: Response to a successful task claim

runId.description: `run-id` assigned to this run of the task

logsPutUrl.description: Signed URL to which `logs.json` must be uploaded before this run is completed. **Note**, you must do a `PUT` to this URL and headers **must** set `ContentLength` and have `ContentType: application/json`. The URL is set to expire with `takenUntil`, reclaim the task to refresh URLs. Workers are encouraged to upload the `logs.json` as soon as possible, especially, if they URLs provided in `logs.json` refers to logs updated during the run.

resultPutUrl.description: Signed URL to which `result.json` must be uploaded before this run is completed. **Note**, you must do a `PUT` to this URL and headers **must** set `ContentLength` and have `ContentType: application/json`. The URL is set to expire with `takenUntil`, reclaim the task to refresh URLs.
